title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, September 22, 2019
description: It was on this day in 1961 that Congress approved a bill to establish the Peace Corps, and President Kennedy signed it into law.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day in 1961 that Congress approved a bill to establish the Peace Corps, and President Kennedy signed it into law.
